page.title: 05RECREATION IN NAILSWORTH
page.content: There are many {active sports} such as football,golf,snooker and cricket,etc. Horse riding is becoming more and more popular. There are tennis courts. There are two local football teams,{Forest Green Rovers} in the Southern League and {Shortwood} {United, }who are one league behind. Nailsworth also has a youth club and boys' club which involves the youth of Nailsworth in such things as{sports, {discos }and many other things. A few times a year the Nailsworth {Dramatic society} puts on plays, in the Town Hall for public viewing . Nailsworth also has a public Library and a dog training club. There is now a{bicycle track}following a disused railway line, which is also used by pedestrians. An{army cadets base}at{St {Georges playing field,}operates in Nailsworth. It is ideal for walking.
